function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High R0 value for COVID-19 (estimated at 2-2.5) indicates rapid spread","Impact":"Increased rate of infection within society","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, location-specific contact patterns","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Economic costs of social distancing for R0<1 and R0\\u22482","Impact":"Unnecessary costs for R0<1, economic benefits for R0\\u22482","Mitigation":"Strategic implementation of social distancing based on R0 value","Technologies":"Game theory on the classic SIR model","People":"Economists, policymakers","Owner":"Economic research institutions, government"},{"Description":"Moderate level of social activities and economic status","Impact":"Balancing disease prevention and economic activity","Mitigation":"Allowing moderate level of social activities with strategic oversight","Technologies":"Economic models, social activity tracking","People":"Business owners, policymakers","Owner":"Government, economic research institutions"}]}
